posts.post_content: A great card all around. The fight mechanic was definitely something the Gruul Clans needed, and it comes on a solid body too. I can only imagine how crazy things would get if you had multiple Ragebeasts in play...

Posted By: TheWallinator74 (2/27/2013 2:02:35 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Love this guy. He's not a 4-of or even a 3-of but 1-2 in a deck can take out just what you need. Boros is really really strong right now and he can thin their ranks down. It turns a [Worldspine Wurm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Worldspine Wurm) into a boardwipe.  
  
At the very least you can get him to go 1 card for 1 card and maybe more.
posts.html:
Love this guy. He's not a 4-of or even a 3-of but 1-2 in a deck can take out just what you need. Boros is really really strong right now and he can thin their ranks down. It turns a Worldspine Wurm into a boardwipe.

At the very least you can get him to go 1 card for 1 card and maybe more.
